---
id: get-payment-slip-bank-slip-digitableline
title: "Get the information of a submitted Bank Slip Payment"
description: "Use this endpoint in order to require the information of a valid Bank Slip payment by passing the payments digitable line or barcode."
sidebar_label: "Get the information of a submitted Bank Slip Payment"
hide_title: true

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the information of a submitted Bank Slip Payment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/bank-slip/{identificationField}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint in order to require the information of a valid Bank Slip payment by passing the payments digitable line or barcode.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"identificationField","description":"Identification field of the slip: \n* Barcode\n* Digitable Line","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
